definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to lose/to transport/to donate/to enter (a password)

sentences.english: Each message is sent as a separate transport-level transmission.
sentences.chinese: 每條消息都被作爲單獨的傳輸層傳送發送。

sentences.english: Transport-level encryption is not covered in this tutorial.
sentences.chinese: 傳輸層加密不在本教程討論之列。

sentences.english: What if all of your applications shared the same transport protocol?
sentences.chinese: 如果您所有的應用程序共享相同的傳輸層協議？

sentences.english: The transport layer is responsible for key exchange and server authentication.
sentences.chinese: 傳輸層負責密鑰交換和服務器身份驗證。

sentences.english: The hole injection layer contains tungsten oxide or molybdenum oxide.
sentences.chinese: 另外，所述空穴傳輸層含有氧化鎢或氧化鉬。

sentences.english: Below the service layers are the transport layers.
sentences.chinese: 服務層的下面是傳輸層。

sentences.english: The application layer and the transport layer use end-to-end protocols.
sentences.chinese: 應用層和傳輸層使用端到端協議。
